text: Monhwε na moanye obiara anni, gyesε obi a obedi mosom no akyi”. (Nkͻmhyεni), Ka sε: “Nokorε sε, ͻkwan tenenee no deε εne Nyankopͻn kwan tenenee no. (Anaa) sε yεde deε yεde maa mo no sεso ama obi foforɔ nti, anaasε (wͻ’begyina saa Adiysεm no so) abͻ mo kwaadu wͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn anim nti (na monni Muhammad) akyi)? Ka sε: “Adom no deε Nyankopͻn nsam na εwͻ na Ɔde ma obi a Ɔpε. Onyankopͻn na Ɔwͻ adom a εsoo paa, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ
